name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Dedicated Senior QA Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, specializing in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, and **Node.js**. Proficient in **CI/CD** practices and skilled in automation, leveraging tools such as **Playwright** for effective testing frameworks. Expertise in code reviews and defect tracking, ensuring high-quality deliverables aligned with agile methodologies.
Proven track record in developing and implementing robust testing strategies that enhance product reliability, specifically within the healthcare and financial sectors. Adept at integrating continuous testing within the development lifecycle, driving improvements in efficiency and quality results.
